welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Marlton, a charming town known for its beautiful parks, lively community events, and delicious local cuisine. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our charming city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at North Philadelphia Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Executive Terminal
terminals.description: The executive terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
